1.0.name: wordpress/wp-flip-image-free
1.0.description:
WP Flip Image Plugin is a great way to show your images in an elgant and smart way! One Click On The Image And It Flips Right Around To Reveal The Text and link That You Want Your Visitors To See! It is just natural that you'll look for what's written on the image backside - WP Flip Image do just that!

You may use WP Flip Image in many ways: - Image gallery - Portfolio - Prudocts gallery and many more!

Easy installation and configuration, copy and place a short-code and you done! Free version allows creating one short-code, choosing from 2 thumbnail gallery size (3x3 or 4x4) only.

UPGRADE to WP Flip Image Pro and get many other features such: * Unlimited galleries to place on your website! * Slider Gallery option with many features! * Thumbnail style gallery of up to 100 images (10x10)! * Full control over the image description (image front side) text, with: font, size, align & background settings * Free updates * Fast support and many more! Upgrade NOW <
